alert.note: Alert for Far South Miami-Dade County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe, Western Miami-Dade, southeastern Hendry, Western Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation to near Dade-Collier Training Airport to near Lower Matecumbe Key. Movement was north northeast at 35 to 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Okeelanta, Loop Road Ee Center, Dade- Collier Training Airport, Royal Palm Ranger, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Shark Valley Obs Tower, Belle Glade Camp, Mahogany Hammock, Pa-Hay- Okee Overlook, Miccosukee Service Plaza, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Everglades National Park, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal and Fortymile Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Far South Miami-Dade County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County; Mainland Monroe
